experiment: F-META2 principle extraction gap measurement and structural fix
hypothesis: Principle extraction rate has declined because DOMEX lanes enforce lesson creation but not principle synthesis; a close_lane.py prompt will make the gap visible and increase conversion rate

method.measurement: Count principles extracted from L-550+ window vs total lessons in that window
method.comparison: Historical overall rate (173P/598L = 28.9%) vs recent window (5P/111L = 4.5%)
method.intervention: Added principle-extraction NOTICE to close_lane.py when MERGED lanes have L-NNN but no P-NNN reference
method.proof_of_concept: Extracted P-221 (from L-646) and P-222 (from L-659) to demonstrate the extraction pattern

principle_candidates_reviewed.verdict: extracted as P-221 — loop closure drives quality, generalizes to any feedback system
instantiation of P-218, not extracted as separate principle
extracted as P-222 — hierarchical enforcement gap, generalizes to any layered system

structural_fix.change: Added principle-extraction NOTICE when MERGED lane has L-NNN but no P-NNN in closure text
structural_fix.mechanism: L-601 structural enforcement — making invisible gap visible at the natural decision point

prediction.escalation: if rate stays <10%, upgrade to periodic batch synthesis or blocking enforcement

iso_connections: ISO-14 (self-similarity — enforcement at each level mirrors enforcement at creation)
